Name: Forbidden Fruits
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: MUDDLE berries in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with ginger beer.
Review: Long and fruity with something of a bite.
History: Created in 2001 by Andres Masso at Lab Bar, London, England.
